item.description: This plugin can determine whether a programme begins earlier or lasts longer. The channel has to provide reliable data.
Check for PDC availability on each service
If possible, x minutes before a timer starts VPS-Plugin will control whether the programme begins earlier. (0 disables feature)

item.text: Wake up from Deep-Standby is allowed
item.description: If enabled and necessary, the plugin will wake up the Receiver from Deep-Standby for the defined starting time to control whether the programme begins earlier.
If a programme is interrupted and divided into separate events, the plugin will search for the connected events.
When yes, VPS will be enabled on instant records (stop after current event), if the channel supports VPS.
